mapper.select: SELECT REVIEW_NO,REVIEW_TITLE,REVIEW_CONTENT,REVIEW_ER_DT,REVIEW_MF_DT,REVIEW_STATUS,REVIEW_REF_PNO,USER_NICKNAME,REVIEW_TN_IMG, REVIEW_IMG,REVIEW_COUNT,REVIEW_SUBTITLE, REVIEW_CNO FROM REVIEW JOIN USER_TB ON(USER_NO=REVIEW_WRITER) WHERE REVIEW_STATUS = 'Y' ORDER BY 1 DESC
